name: CcaImplementationGuide
title: HL7® FHIR® Te Aho o Te Kahu, Cancer Control Agency Implementation Guide

resource.name: ActivityDefinition
resource.description: CCA Regimen Activity Definition.

resource.name: PlanDefinition
resource.description: CCA Regimen Plan Definition.

resource.name: Regimen under review
resource.description:
Additional status values for PlanDefinition. Currently only a single value - review - indicating that a regimen is published and available to be used, but there is still a review being performed, so could change. 
In most situations the value of the status element itself will be 'active'

resource.name: Disclaimer
resource.description: A disclaimer for use of this Plan

resource.name: LocationAdministration
resource.description: The physical Location where the medication administration occurs (eg home or clinic)

resource.name: LocationMedicationCollection
resource.description: The physical Location where the medication can be collection prior to collection

resource.name: Off label
resource.description: Indicates that the medication is being used for a purpose for which it has not been specifically approved

resource.name: Instructions for use
resource.description: Specific instructions for use of the regimen overall, or for the individual cycles

resource.name: Regimen type
resource.description: The overall type of the regimen - eg FOLFOX

resource.name: Replaced by
resource.description: When a Plan has been deprecated (superceeded or discontinued), refers to the one that replaces it, if any

resource.name: SupportFactor
resource.description: Support factors needed during treatment

resource.name: TimingOfDays
resource.description: Allows specific days to be indicated in a component of a regimen cycle. extends the idea of  UV extension: http://hl7.org/fhir/extension-timing-daysofcycle.html by adding instructions

resource.name: TreatmentIntent
resource.description: The intent of the regimen - what is its purpose

resource.name: Cancer type
resource.description: The type of Cancer

resource.name: Administration location
resource.description: The physical location where the administration occurred - eg at home or in a clinic

resource.name: Medication collection location
resource.description: The physical location where the medication can be collected on prior to administration - eg a pharmacy

resource.name: PlanDefinition additional status
resource.description: Other codes used for the PlanDefinition status

resource.name: Regimen type code
resource.description: The type of regimen - eg FOLFOX

resource.name: Support Factors
resource.description: The set of possible support factors (not their values)

resource.name: Possible values for Support Factors
resource.description: The set of all possible support factors values (not specific to any one factor)

resource.name: Treatment intent
resource.description: The intent of the regimen - what is its purpose

resource.name: PlanDefinition additional status
resource.description: Other codes used for the PlanDefinition status

resource.name: Regimen type code
resource.description: Codes used for the regimen type

resource.name: Treatment intent
resource.description: The intent of the regimen - what is its purpose

resource.name: ActCabergoline
resource.description: Cabergoline Administration

resource.name: ActTragacanth
resource.description: Tragacanth Administration

resource.name: CapabilityStatement
resource.description: Represents API exposed to retrieve plans

resource.name: ColoRectal
resource.description: Example Plan definition for coloRectal cancer

resource.name: CancerRegimensLM
